__e: Am I to see if Sir Richard Carlisle has a younger brother - one even richer than he is?
Sir Richard... over something he did to me when I was working for him.
But how can you ask Sir Richard for help without telling him the truth?
But if Sir Henry isn't the one who is?
Now that you're here, would you like to come in and see Sir Henry?
He says, sir Henry gave his family the land.Why did he?
I felt for a few months you should have no offers With people like Sir John.
I cannot have Sir John hovering about me all the time.
If only you could be more like him, Sir Thomas.
Because, you see, Sir Thomas is already married.
Sir Thomas, the first time we met I imagine it was hard for you to realize that I didn't like you.

Losing a man is scant cause for concern... but losing a man to her is another matter entirely. And so I feel it only right that Sir Robert should know, as indeed he shall... when the letter arrives at his office first thing in the morning.
An hour here or there is of little consequence.
Because, Ma'am, the country needs a government, and at this moment it seems that only Sir Robert has the confidence of the House.
Then, you see, I was Sir Charles' best friend.
Speak to us, Sir Charles, if you are here.
Then as his physician what would you say was the cause of Sir Charles' death?
